title: Intro-Automation&Robotic
description: Concurrent engineering principles; robotic manipulator kinematics, dynamics, and control; applications of robots in industry, medicine, and other areas; team projects and hands-on laboratory experience.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 3084 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3085 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3550 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
